Class CompanyRep

java.lang.Object
entity.User
entity.CompanyRep
public class CompanyRep extends User
Represents a Company Representative who manages internship postings and applications for their company.

This entity is responsible for creating and managing internship opportunities on behalf of their company. Company representatives must be approved by career center staff before they can create postings or manage applications.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Create and manage internship postings (subject to approval and posting limits)
  • Set visibility of approved internship postings
  • Review and make decisions on internship applications
  • Close/hide internship postings when needed

Posting Limits: Each representative is limited to 5 active postings.

    • MAX_POSTINGS

      public static final int MAX_POSTINGS
      Maximum number of active postings allowed per company representative.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • CompanyRep

      public CompanyRep(String userId, String name, String companyName, String department, String position, String email)
      Creates a new Company Representative account (initially not approved). The representative must be approved by career center staff before performing any platform operations.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier for the representative
      name - the full name of the representative
      companyName - the company the representative belongs to
      department - the department within the company
      position - the representative's job position/title
      email - the contact email address
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any required field is null or blank

  • Method Details

    • getCompanyName

      public String getCompanyName()
      Returns the company name this representative works for.
      Returns:
      the company name

    • getDepartment

      public String getDepartment()
      Returns the department within the company.
      Returns:
      the department name

    • getPosition

      public String getPosition()
      Returns the representative's job position/title.
      Returns:
      the position title

    • getEmail

      public String getEmail()
      Returns the contact email address.
      Returns:
      the email address

    • isApproved

      public boolean isApproved()
      Checks if this representative has been approved by career center staff.
      Returns:
      true if approved, false otherwise

    • isRejected

      public boolean isRejected()
      Checks if this representative has been rejected by career center staff.
      Returns:
      true if rejected (not approved and has a rejection reason), false otherwise

    • getRejectionReason

      public String getRejectionReason()
      Returns the reason for rejection, if any.
      Returns:
      the rejection reason, or empty string if not rejected

    • approve

      public void approve()
      Approves this company representative for platform access. Clears any previous rejection reason and enables all representative capabilities.

    • reject

      public void reject(String reason)
      Rejects this company representative with a specified reason. Prevents the representative from using platform capabilities until approved.
      Parameters:
      reason - the reason for rejection

    • canCreateAnotherPosting

      public boolean canCreateAnotherPosting(CompanyRep.RepPostingReadPort port)
      Checks whether the representative has capacity to create another posting. Verifies that the current number of active postings is below the maximum limit.
      Parameters:
      port - the read port used to count existing active postings
      Returns:
      true if under the posting cap, false otherwise
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the port is null

    • createInternship

      public Internship createInternship(String title, String description, InternshipLevel level, String preferredMajor, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, int maxSlots, CompanyRep.RepPostingReadPort port)
      Creates a new internship posting owned by this representative's company.

      Prerequisites:

      • Representative must be approved
      • Representative must be under the posting cap
      Parameters:
      title - the internship title
      description - the internship description
      level - the internship level
      preferredMajor - the preferred major for applicants
      openDate - the date when applications open
      closeDate - the date when applications close
      maxSlots - the maximum number of confirmed slots available
      port - the read port used to verify posting capacity
      Returns:
      a new Internship instance (initially not approved or visible)
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if representative is not approved or has reached posting cap
      NullPointerException - if any required parameter is null

    • setInternshipVisibility

      public void setInternshipVisibility(Internship internship, boolean visible)
      Sets visibility for an internship posting owned by this representative. Only approved internships can be made visible to students.
      Parameters:
      internship - the internship to modify visibility for
      visible - true to make visible, false to hide
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the internship does not belong to this representative's company
      NullPointerException - if the internship is null

    • closePosting

      public void closePosting(Internship internship)
      Closes and hides a posting owned by this representative without changing its approval status. This is typically used when an internship position is filled or no longer available.
      Parameters:
      internship - the posting to close
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the internship does not belong to this representative's company
      NullPointerException - if the internship is null

    • approveApplication

      public void approveApplication(InternshipApplication app)
      Approves a pending internship application (offers the position). Changes the application status to SUCCESSFUL.
      Parameters:
      app - the application to approve
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the application's internship does not belong to this representative's company
      NullPointerException - if the application is null

    • rejectApplication

      public void rejectApplication(InternshipApplication app)
      Rejects a pending internship application. Changes the application status to UNSUCCESSFUL.
      Parameters:
      app - the application to reject
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the application's internship does not belong to this representative's company
      NullPointerException - if the application is null
